# who-data


[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/ATFutures/who.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/ATFutures/who) 
[![Project Status: Abandoned.](http://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/abandoned.svg)](http://www.repostatus.org/#abandoned)


Old data and code used for first report to WHO. From hereon, all data will be
housed in the [`who-data` repo](https://github.com/ATFutures/who-data) as
binaries attached to released, rather than directly in the package repo itself.
